00022 #ifndef __ACQ200_IOCTL_H__
00023 #define __ACQ200_IOCTL_H__
00024 
00025 #include <asm/ioctl.h>
00026 #include <asm/types.h>
00027 
00028 #define DMAGIC 0xDA
00029 
00030 #define MBOX_NUM 4
00031 #define MBC_FLAGS_TO            0xffff    /* timeout in jiffies */
00032 #define MBC_FLAGS_TO_FOREVER    0
00033 #define MBC_FLAGS_MBXW          0x000f0000 /* mask mailboxes to write */
00034 #define MBC_FLAGS_MBXR          0x00f00000 /* mask mailboxes to read  */
00035 
00036 #define MBC_TO_MBXW(mx)         ((mx) << 16)
00037 #define MBC_FROM_MBXW(mbc)      (((mbc->mbc_flags)&MBC_FLAGS_MBXW) >> 16)
00038 
00039 #define MBC_TO_MBXR(mx)         ((mx) << 20)
00040 #define MBC_FROM_MBXR(mbc)      (((mbc->mbc_flags)&MBC_FLAGS_MBXR) >> 20)
00041 
00042 struct MailboxControl {
00043         u32 mbc_flags;
00044         u32 mbxw[MBOX_NUM];     /* mailbox write values */
00045         u32 mbxr[MBOX_NUM];     /* mailbox read values  */      
00046 };
00047 
00048 
00050 #define ACQ200_MBOX_IOR         _IOR(DMAGIC,   1, struct MailboxControl)
00051 
00052 #define ACQ200_MBOX_IOW         _IOW(DMAGIC,   2, struct MailboxControl)
00053 
00054 #define ACQ200_MBOX_IOWR        _IOWR(DMAGIC,  3, struct MailboxControl)
00055

00058 enum {
00059     EACQ32_NO_INCOMING_I2O    = 3200,
00060     EACQ32_NO_MAPPING,
00061     EACQ32_OUT_OF_MAPPING_RANGE,
00062     EACQ32_OFFSET_NOT_ON_WHOLE_BUFFER_BOUNDARY
00063 };

00076 #define BUFFERA 0
00077 #define BUFFERB 1
00078 
00079 #define BUFFER_A_FLAG   0x1
00080 #define BUFFER_B_FLAG   0x2
00081 
00082 #define BUFFER_FLAG_LUT "\x1\x2"
00083 
00084 #define FOREVER ((long)(~0UL>>1))       /* MAX_SCHEDULE_TIMEOUT */
00085 
00086 #define FULL_EOF        0x80000000
00087 
00088 struct BufferAB_Ops {
00089         struct ClientInstructions {
00090                 unsigned recycle;      /* client returns buff to circulation */
00091                 unsigned timeout;      /* timeout ticks to block for */
00092         }
00093                 ci;
00094         struct DriverStatus {
00095                 unsigned full;          /* buffer full flags */
00096                 unsigned sid[2];        /* buffer sequence id numbers */
00097                 unsigned len[2];        /* data length in buffer (bytes) */
00098         }        
00099                 ds;
00100 };
00101 #define BUFFERAB_OPS_SZ (sizeof(struct BufferAB_Ops))
00102 
00103 #define ACQ200_BUFFER_AB_IOWR   _IOWR(DMAGIC, 4, struct BufferAB_Ops)
